mdx.excerpt: Planning There are 2 types of 3D printers: FDM (Fused Deposition Modeling) and SLA (Stereolithography). FDM printers are more common and cheaper, but SLAâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Ultimate 3D printer guide for beginners
frontmatter.description: As a fellow who just bought a 3d printer, I know how hard it is to get started. So, I decided to write a guide for beginners to help them get started with 3d printing.

frontmatter.title: Making a Drone less than 300 dollars
frontmatter.description: A guide to making a drone for less than 300 dollars. This guide will help you build a drone from scratch and save money.
